content: Instance initializers are blocks of code that are executed at the same time as initializers for instance (non-static) fields.  Instance field initializers and instance initializers are executed in the order declared. Both instance initializers and instance field initializers are executed during the invocation of a constructor.  The initializers are executed immediately after the superclass constructor and before the body of the constructor.
